sentences.sContent: These base camps were used by the PKK guerrillas to make forays into Turkey.
sentences.sCn: 这些基地营被库尔德工人党游击队用来对土耳其进行突袭。

remMethod.val: fo(看作for， 为了) + ray(光线) → 为了光明， 偷袭敌人 → 突袭， 偷袭

trans.tranOther: a short sudden attack by a group of soldiers, especially in order to get food or supplies
